EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for downloading Security & Compliance with Pivotal Cloud Foundry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the Security & Compliance with Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/security-and-compliance-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry]]> white paper. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you investigate technology options for your cloud-native journey. Given your interest in this white paper, we thought you might also like additional Cloud-Native Security resources <[[https://content.pivotal.io/thanks-for-downloading-the-security-compliance-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry-white-paper]]>. Feel free to check them out here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/thanks-for-downloading-the-security-compliance-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry-white-paper]]>.
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its cloud-native journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>. Thank you, The Pivotal Team
